short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SoftUni Project - Lead by: Deyan Danailov

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scraper is a handy tool developed by students to help you gather product data from various websites effortlessly. Simply install the extension, and it will scrape product information from online sources. The scraped data is then sent to a backend server for storage. You can easily access and summarize this data using our client application for convenient analysis.
